story:
What?

Two dreams with one campaign.
First: My dream of writing a song and having it professionally produced
Second: A couple's dream of having children
 

How?

Step 1: Write a song
Step 2: Find a professional singer to help perfect it, produce it and then perform it.
Step 3: Use the song to inspire, promote and ultimately fund the couple's dream of adopting.
Simple, right?

Why?

Ray and Julie Stewart have been married for 12 years and have been hoping to have children. They’ve tried every technique without success. Over a year ago they turned to adoption. Modern adoption, however, has changed dramatically in recent years. To adopt today, you basically have to market yourself through social media, blogging and profiles on adoption websites. Think Match.com for adoption. These changes overall are fantastic for the industry, but they aren’t without their problems. At 5’ 6” and 380 lbs it was very hard for Ray to feel comfortable marketing himself. Harder still as his wife is overweight as well. At the beginning of this year Ray and Julie didn’t see how they could possibly attract someone to give their child to them.

Ten months ago everything changed when Ray entered a contest to be on a new reality TV show all about losing weight. He won the contest and he and Julie have since transformed not only their bodies but their lives. In fact they have motivated hundreds around them to do the same. At the heart of their transformation has been their yearning to be parents. In the process Ray coined the phrase, “Do It Anyway” — pointing to how he treats doing very difficult things (he just finished doing the Spartan Beast!). 

His personal trainer (a local trainer who agreed to train him on the TV show) and his nutritionist (his trainer’s wife) have helped him lose over 150 lbs. in less than seven months. One of the incredible by-products of his transformation is that his trainer and nutritionist have started a fitness challenge called "The Simple Clean Eats 40 Day Challenge”. I was involved in the first one held in July and August. I ended up being the co-winner of the challenge. I lost 20 lbs. in 40 days. It was amazing! 

As a result of Ray and Julie's story I wrote a country song called, “Do It Anyway”. I wanted to somehow "give" this song to Ray and Julie in celebration of what they've done and how much they've inspired me and others. The problem is, I don't have the voice nor the band for it.  So I decided to look for a local band to produce the song. I needed a very specific sounding, deep, resonating voice that could pump people up.

That's what this is all about. I want a professional band to help finish my song, produce it and sing it at a live event on October 19th. That's why I have such a lofty goal of $10,000. Producing a song is crazy expensive and renting a place to host a star performer is as well. Since I'm not exactly rolling, I've turned to crowdsourcing. I think I have a story worth sharing and there's no better way than a good old country song, sung by one of the hottest up and coming country stars to share it.

Now, I just need your help!


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? Spread the word. Tell everyone about the project. Every dollar helps get us closer to our goal.

story:
Hi! 

My name is Vizi, singer,songwriter from Transylvania,Romania. I participated to a talent show called The Voice and achieved 2 place in 2012  then in 2014 i achieved 2 place at the national selection for Eurovision. 

My album is composed of songs that have messages. Even though it has been said many times, i would like to contribute to the changes in the world with my music. I take everyday life and imagine it in it's perfection and put it into songs so when you are down it could be your medicine because i strongly believe that music has healing powers if made right.


 I need 15000$ to record 10 songs that includes:

 -studio time at 7Cats Studio Baia Mare

 -musicians: drummer, guitar player, keyboard player, bass player, string quartet, horns,female backvocals 

 -mixing, mastering in Switzerland, UK, and USA

The coolest thing about this album is that it will be absolutely organic, no synths no artificial instruments whatsoever and  will be published on vinyl with artwork from a painter from Germany.

I feel lucky because the people involved in this project are friends of mine and they support me with low studio prices this is why i don't need a bigger amount of money. But if there will be money i did not spend from this campaign i will donate it to the St. Elisabeth foundation from Targu Mures that takes care of orfans and people in need. If i raise a smaller amount of money i will start my album and put it on hold until i find the rest of the funding.

Because the trend nowadays goes very much towards artificial, superficial, i would like to go against the trend and remind people that we are humans and we should be honest, not judging the book by it's cover. We should smile more spend more time with the others. In less words, i would like to bring back the human factor to our lives through my music.

I would like to make this album happen in maximum 1 year. My songs are already written, i have spoken with the studios and the german painter. 

Any help and share is appreciated.

(English translation at bottom)


მიმოხილვა:

ახალი მუსიკის მოძრაობის შექმნაში გინდათ დაგვეხმაროთ?  გინდათ გავიზარდოთ მუსიკის სცენა საქართველოში?  ამ კონცერტით დავიწყოთ.  ტობი დრაივერი, ესპერიმენტალური როკის და მეტალის ცნობილი მუსიკოსი Kayo Dot-სა და maudlin of the Well-ში , მარტში ჩამოვა საქართველოში კონცერტის ჩასატარებლად თავის ევროპული ტურის ფარგვლებში.  მრავალფეროვანი და სხვადასხვა ჟენრის მუსიკა და მისი შემოქმედება შეიცავს მრავალფეროვან, სხვადასხვა ჟანრის მუსიკებს ისეთი ინსტრუმენტებით როგორებიცაა ვიოლინო, კლარნეტი, საქსაფონი და საყვირი.  აყენებს მუსიკისა და მის მცმენელებს ლიმიტს.  ამჯერად, წყნარ და მსუბუქ ბალადებს შეასრულებს ინგლისელ მუსიკოსთან, ნიკ ჰადსონსა და Kayo Dot-ს ერთ-ერთი წევრი კიტ აბრამსი.  დაგვეხმარეთ კამპაანიაში და შემოგვიერთდით კონცერტზე, მოძრაობის თეატრში 16 მარტს.
მთავარი გჯუფი შეიცავს: ტობი დრაივერი - გიტარა, კლავიშები, მომღერალი; ნიკ ჰადსონი - პიანინო, მომღერალი; კიტ აბრამსი - დასარტყამი ინსტრუმენტები.  ამ ლინკზე შეგიძლია მოუსმინოთ ერთ მაგალითს გჯუფის სტილში: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jJ2eGa64OQ4
Fotgjengeren-ც (მოსიარულე ნორვეგიულად) ამ კონცერტზე მიიღებს მონაწილეობას.  ექსპერიმენტული ჯგუფია, რომელიც როკის ფარგვლებში ბევრ სხვადასხვა ინსტრუმენტს იყენებს, ხუთწევრიან გჯუფში სცენაზე გამოვა.  ძირითადად ახალ მუსიკას შეასრულებენ, ასევე ზოგ ძველ სიმღერებს.  


რაში გვჭირდება თქვენი მხარდაჭერა.:

- შევაგროვოთ თანხა სამივე მუსიკოსის თვითფრინავის ბილეთისთვის

- გადავუხადოთ მუსიკოსებს შესანიშნავი მუსიკალური საღამოსთვის

-დაფაროთ კონცერტის ორგანიზების სხვა ხარჯები


შედეგები:

- წარმატებული კონცერტი

- საქართველოში მსგავსი კონცერტების განმეორების შანსი

ნებისმიერი შეწირულობისთვის მადლიერები ვიქნებით.  

Overview:

Want to help start a new musical movement in Georgia?  Want to help grow the music scene here?  Here’s where we can begin.  Toby Driver, famous in the experimental rock/metal musical world for projects such as Kayo Dot and maudlin of the Well, will be coming to Georgia to play a concert in March, as part of his European tour.  He has explored music in numerous genres, using many instruments, including violin, clarinet, saxophone and trumpet, trying to push his limits and the limits of his listeners.  This time around, with the help of English musician Nick Hudson and fellow Kayo Dot-er, Keith Abrams they’re going to play chill and laid-back ballades.  Help our campaign and join us on March 16 at Movement theater for the concert.  

The headliner will consist of Toby Driver on guitar, keyboards and vocals with Keith Abrams on drums and Nick Hudson on piano and vocals.   Here's an example of something they would play:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jJ2eGa64OQ4

Fotgjengeren (Norwegian for "The  Pedestrian") will also perform in this concert.  They're an experimental music group known for using many instruments in a rock format and will take the stage as the opening act in a five-man line-up.  They will primarily be playing new music with some old songs as well.  


What you will help us with:

-collect money for all three member's plane tickets

-pay these performers for a remarkable evening of music

-pay for any other expenses for organizing the concert


Outcomes:

-a successful performance
-the chance for more concerts of this nature in the future in Georgia

We appreciate any contribution you can give us in support of this project.

story:
Music has been my passion since I started singing at the age of 12. Since then, it's become who I am and what I am known for.

 

My name is Erin Burke,

I have started this campaign to fund my new record!   

I have had this new project circling my thoughts since the release of my first E.P. in early 2015. I knew I wanted my next project to show how serious I am about music. I needed to find a producer who had the skill and experience to help me make a statement for this new record.

Matt Troja, an outstanding producer that knows what it takes to produce the sound I’m looking for. He has recorded and worked with top artists like, Keith Urban, Sara Evans, Jeff Coffin from The David Mathews Band, and many other top musicians. This opportunity to work with Matt is so important to me. Working together as a team, we will find the right sound and style that's fit for me. With your help, we can achieve a dream I have held onto tightly since the beginning of my music career.

Here's The Breakdown:

For this campaign's ultimate success, we need to raise $15,000.

Yes! I know what you're thinking, "what a fun number!"

Let me explain, we are looking to put 6-7 tracks on this record. With professional production of each song and the cost of mixing and mastering, the price becomes hefty.

This number can be met in the time span of 60 days that we have.

For this campaign, I've created an advertising plan for specific social media platforms that will reach beyond our local towns. This will help get the word out. But, I still need your HELP with contributions and much sharing. I wouldn't be reaching for this BIG GOAL if I didn't think we could do it!

 

Here's some more detail about YOUR perks!

This is the most exciting part.

A contribution range of $10 to $1,000 means a wide variety of awesome gifts!

Items such as:

    

-Stickers

-Signed posters and hard copies of the E.P.

-Exclusive early downloads of the released single

-Individual acknowledgement on the records credits

-Choice of a 2 hour event where I will perform songs off the E.P. and many other favorites

-Personal thank you letters

-Original lyrics

-A video cover of your favorite song

-The grand gift: A personal at home concert for your family and friends. That's right! I'll be bringing the music right to you!

Important:

By the end of this campaign, if the max goal was not reached, contributions will still be used for the production of the E.P.

 

To my fans:

Many, if not most of you contributing have known me since I was a child, or have met me at school, or you've talked to/ seen me on Facebook. I try my best to express my love for music and those who I share it with on a daily basis.

The impact you can make by supporting someone's dream can cause miraculous opportunities to happen. Reaching the title of a national recording artist comes only by the artist's great supporters!

 

Obstacles:

With every big goal, comes big challenges.

Some of these challenges include not meeting the goal amount, which in turn means fewer tracks on this E.P.

I cannot express enough how much this campaign MUST be SHARED.

I truly feel that there is a STRONG backbone of SUPPORT that I've gained through the years to ACHIEVE this GOAL!

 

Other Ways To Help:

I understand that there are those who would like to contribute, but sometimes life hands you lemons. Simply sharing this campaign to your social media outlets will do so much!


THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND CONTRIBUTIONS!
